resources.string: Welcome to Credit Card scan and Exchange via NFC.
NFC feature not found on your device, you can\'t Exchange via NFC.
Do you want to receive Credit Card details via NFC ?
Tap a device to transfer/receive Credit Card details.
Please go to Settings and enable NFC to use this feature

Welcome to Credit Card scan and Exchange via NFC. 

How to use.. 
1. Click on "Scan Your Credit Card" to scan your credit card. 
2. Click on "Exchange via NFC" on both the device and tap to transfer Credit Card details.
